show.title: School Hall
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://kukufm.com/show/school-hall/?utm_source=share_sh
show.description: A prestigious boarding school harbors sinister secrets when a student vanishes without a trace from Crestwood Academy's storied halls. Four determined friends launch their own investigation, only to uncover a centuries-old web of dark rituals and clandestine societies operating beneath the school's polished facade. As they delve deeper into the mystery, they face escalating dangers that will test not only their friendship but their very survival in this atmospheric thriller where education meets terror.
